title: Limitations on Dangerous Articles
content:
Limitations on Dangerous Articles

State Regulations
§ 1260.40 - Operation of cutting torches and like devices restricted
§ 1260.41 - Open fires restricted
§ 1260.42 - Storage, use or transportation of explosives and other dangerous substances restricted
§ 1260.43 - Permission required for storage, handling or loading explosives or other dangerous articles barred by Federal regulations
§ 1260.44 - Storage, handling or transportation of radioactive materials restricted
§ 1260.45 - Storage, handling or transportation of atomic weapons prohibited

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
